meanings.sent1: The unsecured document was left out in the rain and got ruined.
meanings.sent2: She felt unsecured walking alone in the dark alley.
meanings.sent3: The unsecured umbrella flew away in the strong wind.
meanings.sent4: His unsecured position in the company made him feel vulnerable.
meanings.sent5: Leaving the door unsecured allowed the cat to escape easily.

meanings.sent1: The unsecured loan did not require any assets as guarantee.

meanings.sent5: Taking out an unsecured personal loan helped cover the unexpected expenses.

meanings.sent1: The unsecured gate swung open with the slightest push.
meanings.sent2: Leaving the window unsecured allowed the breeze to flow freely into the room.
